casebody.data:
Thursday, January 10, 2002

MOTION DOCKET

00-1420. Boggs v. Moovies, Inc.

Mahoning App. No. 98CA155. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. On October 5, 2000, this court stayed further proceedings in this case and ordered appellants to file a notice with this court upon the termination of the automatic stay under the Bankruptcy Code.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that appellants file a notice advising the court of the status of the bankruptcy case, within fifteen days of the date of this entry.
